鶾鶾鶾

鶾字的基本解释

鶾
hàn
古同“翰”。

鶾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hàn］
［《廣韻》胡安切，平寒，匣。］
祭礼上用的肥鸡，又名“鶾（翰）音”。

鶾字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鶾； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1497第03
【唐韻】侯幹切【集韻】侯旰切，?音翰。【說文】鶾，雉肥鶾者也。魯郊以丹雞祝曰：以斯鶾音赤羽，去魯侯之咎。【爾雅·釋鳥】鶾，天雞。【郭註】鶾雞赤羽。【逸周書】文鶾若彩雞，成王時蜀人獻之。【疏】鳥有文彩者也。又【博古辨】古玉多刻天雞紋，其尾翅輪如鴛鴦，卽錦雞。又【玉篇】雞肥貌。今爲翰。【禮·曲禮】雞曰翰音。又與雗同。【爾雅·釋鳥】雗雉，?雉。【疏】雗卽鶾也。詳隹部雗字註。又【廣韻】胡安切【集韻】何干切，?音寒。義同。

鶾字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鶾字的起名意思

暂无。

鶾
Basic explanation of words
鶾
hàn
Ancient Tong "John".
鶾
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hàn］
["Guangyun" Juanqie, Ping Han, Xia. ]
The fat chicken used in the ceremonies is also called "鶾(汉)音".
鶾
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鶾; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1497 No. 03
[Tang Yun] Hou Ganqie [Ji Yun] Hou Miqie,? Yinhan. [Said the text] 鶾, pheasant fat 鶾 also. Lu Jiao Yi Danji Zhu said: Yisi Chanyin Chiba, go to the blame of Luhou. 【Erya·Shiniao】鶾, Tianji. [Guo's Note] Chiba Chiba. [Book of Yi Zhou] Wen Qian is like a colorful chicken, presented by the people of Shu when he became a king. 【Sparse】Birds have art and color. In addition, the ancient jade is often carved with Tianji pattern, and its tail wing wheel is like a mandarin duck and golden pheasant. Also 【Jade articles】Chicken fat appearance. Today is John. 【Rite·Song Li】The chicken is called Hanyin. Same with Yu. [Erya·Shiniao] Pheasant,? Pheasant. 【Sparse】Yi 卽鶾 also. Detailed notes on the word 雹 Bu 雗. And [Guang Yun] Hu Anqi [Ji Yun] How dry? The sound is cold. The same meaning.
